scenarios.title: Murder at Amicalola
scenarios.description: A high-stakes poisoning at the Sterling Lodge during a stormy New Year's Eve.

easy.label: Rookie Detective
easy.description: Body and weapon found. Suspects are nervous and talkative.

medium.label: Seasoned Investigator
medium.description: Weapon is hidden. Suspects are guarded and require specific questions.

hard.label: Hardened Sleuth
hard.description: Missing Person case. Body buried. Weapon destroyed. Suspects are hostile.
